title: MEA Affordability Executive
summary: Apple is looking for a MEA Affordability Executive to develop the most attractive consumer finance propositions across MEA in collaboration with banks, NBFIs and Trade-in vendors.
description: Work in collaboration with the central affordability team on the design, development and roll out of offer strategies across different sales channels in MEA (Carriers, Retailers, Independent Retail)......
key_qualifications: An outstanding track record developing consumer finance propositions in banks and/or non-banking financial institutions. Expertise in understanding commercial value chain of payment schemes across issuing and acquiring businesses. A track record of developing and delivering consumer credit propositions like personal loans, durables finance, auto lending programs......
preferred_qualifications: Exposure to reward, loyalty and co-brand products in a bank preferred. Expertise in eCommerce and digital lending preferred. Experience in carrier affordability propositions is preferred. International experience and proficiency in different languages preferred.
